body: @supercym It seems that the ci check failed, could you solve this problem first?

@supercym 

1. Did you follow the ·Verifying this change· checklist to push your pr?
2. Could you only commit your modified parts? I have seen many irrelevant commits in other commits.
3. Just for kindly reminder, Did you modified some method for getting IP in Utils class?

@lebin Thanks for your pr. we'll fix the problem in the nearing release version.
@zhanguohuang Good catch, It seems that it's indeed a bug in creating remoting channel.
@duhenglucky  Thanks.

What about if modifying the code in `ConsumeMessageConcurrentlyService.java` 
from
```
            this.consumeExecutor = new ThreadPoolExecutor(
            this.defaultMQPushConsumer.getConsumeThreadMin(),
            this.defaultMQPushConsumer.getConsumeThreadMax(),
            1000 * 60,
            TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS,
            this.consumeRequestQueue,
            new ThreadFactoryImpl("ConsumeMessageThread_"));

        this.scheduledExecutorService = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor(new ThreadFactoryImpl("ConsumeMessageScheduledThread_"));
        this.cleanExpireMsgExecutors = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor(new ThreadFactoryImpl("CleanExpireMsgScheduledThread_"));
```

to

```
            this.consumeExecutor = new ThreadPoolExecutor(
            this.defaultMQPushConsumer.getConsumeThreadMin(),
            this.defaultMQPushConsumer.getConsumeThreadMax(),
            1000 * 60,
            TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS,
            this.consumeRequestQueue,
            new ThreadFactoryImpl("ConsumeMessageThread_" + this.consumerGroup + "_"));

        this.scheduledExecutorService = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor(new ThreadFactoryImpl("ConsumeMessageScheduledThread_" + this.consumerGroup + "_"));
        this.cleanExpireMsgExecutors = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor(new ThreadFactoryImpl("CleanExpireMsgScheduledThread_" + this.consumerGroup + "_"));
```
@zongtanghu
if you want to integrate rocketmq with spring, there's official support in https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-spring.

@xiaoluobotouzi as an append-only messaging middleware, there's no ways to delete a message by messageId, but you can skip this message by reset consume offset.
The issue only used for a bug report or feature request, if you have some questions, please subscribe our mailing list and send your question by email: https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/, so I will close this issue, but please feel free to reopen it if you have more questions.

@baihezhuo oneway 表示不等待服务端的业务处理响应，并不意味着不去检查相关业务逻辑是否正确。 
由于issue只用于bug report跟feature request，所以咨询类的问题尽量走邮件列表: https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/, 这样可以沉淀下来，并且被检索到方便其他遇到同样疑问的小伙伴，所以我先暂时关掉这个issue，有问题的话，随时重新打开。
@tyhqiushen 能不能提供多一点的日志以供分析，或者这几条消息是不是有什么比较特别的地方，理论上rocketmq是不存在丢失消息的可能的。

@ahuazhu it seems that if you created more than one consumer in a process,  you will be confused by so many similar scenes, so how about subscribe multiple topics in a consumer instead of creating multi consumers in one process? or maybe we should think about a relative unite resolve plan to resolve this issue(instance name or group?). looking forward to your voice.

@eagle2016 good question, up to now, the name server is an AP solution for service discovery, it brings a lot of conveniences, but it will also cause consistency problems（Of course, this doesn't seem to be a problem in this scenario）, so we can't use this to solve the switching problem temporarily.
But as you described deleger mode will bring a large performance loss, do you have relevant data to prove this problem? we can optimize this problem together, dledger is a very good high availability and consistent solution in messaging middleware.
@liuruiyiyang thanks for your contribution, closed for this issue has been resolved.

@AbelSara Could you describe your scenes that need the consumer to add a property to message header？
The issue only used for a bug report or feature request, if you have some questions, please subscribe our mailing list and send your question by email: https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/, so I will close this issue, but please feel free to reopen it if you have more questions.

@intSpark @sunxin1993 IMHO, in java, Collection.sort() used a stable sort algorithm, so shuffle() before sort() will make the selection algorithm fairer. Looking forward to your sounds about these issue.

@tyshan you could find the consumer thread is always running. We strongly recommend you use the rocketmq-spring project which maintained by communities.
@jenvenson looking forward to your detailed description of the problem。

@vongosling I am so sorry about it, i wrote some codes to reproduce the problem and testers tested it, but there hava no unit test to verify the code yet. I updated the company's online code five months ago in this way, and then this issue was solved well.

@zhanguohuang Thanks for your explanation. RocketMQ is still in the development stage, we've been insisting on writing the clean code. Unit Test is no doubt to go after all. In general, if you are optimizing for a module that does not have a test, it is better to create a new class and follow the code specification to coverage modified codes.

THANKS for your contribution. For most of the cases, we don't need a thread-safe String concat.
But  could u please change your destination branch to develop?
@xiangwangcheng Yes
@xiangwangcheng I rebased develop to my branch and changed the destination branch to develop in a new PR https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1364.

@yuanx1 不会，pid用两个字节就够了，issue用于bug报告，以及新特性讨论，如果有问题的话尽量现在邮件列表（https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/）讨论，这样的话是可以被检索到的，也方便沉淀下来。我先暂时关了这个issue，如果有问题的话，随时reopen。

@wuangKKK 有一种可能就是你没有设置instanceName，但是在容器中很有可能你的ip是重复的，导致consumer rebalance出现问题，先从这个角度去查一下吧, 可以参考这个[issue](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues/667)。
另外，issue用于bug报告，以及新特性讨论，如果有问题的话尽量现在邮件列表（https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/）讨论，这样的话是可以被检索到的，也方便沉淀下来以供其他小伙伴搜索，因此，我先暂时关了这个issue，如果有问题的话，随时reopen。

@jiangxinlingdu as discussed offline, we will continue to pay attention to this issue, welcome to provide more information about it.
 there is nothing to found out from the modification time of your commitlog,because the rocketmq will create a commitlog in advance, and the above log is caused by the issue of the offset of the consumer request(In your condition, it seems occurred in delay message). It is best to check the consumer code first.
@duhenglucky If you need any information，you can ask for me！
@liucyu Thanks for your report, and could you describe this issue in detail or pull a request to describe it directly？
@xhkyyy it seems that you just changed the storePathCommitLog, but moved all store message to this path, maybe you should change the storePathRootDir config.

> @HymanShi As you described, rocketmq indeed need to polish the mechanism to make it more clear and useful for positioning problem, so would you like to polish this together?
> 
> The second question, if the producer still retries when the SYSTEM_BUSY exception was responded by the server, it will increase the load of the server, so in order to protect the server,
> the producer will stop the retry process.

@duhenglucky Thanks for your invitation, I'd like to polish this mechanism and how can i join it?
Reply to the second question:In fact, when users happen the SYSTEM_BUSY or other exceptions which are not in the retry list,users always resend the message themselves immediately in order to prevent sending failure.It will still increase the load of the server.Maybe rocketmq should provide a self-later-resend mechanism when SYSTEM_BUSY or other exception happens.

Finally, I resolve this problem.
Every time load test will repeat this scenario. but this time, the error throws #IOException: Map failed#, and the logs shows broker mapped lots of file, I guess there is some relationship.
After tuning linux param: sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=655360, the problem solved.
Actually, this crash caused by ourself, because rocketmq has a tuning bash, we forget running.
`https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/blob/master/distribution/bin/os.sh`

> @xhkyyy it seems that you just changed the storePathCommitLog, but moved all store message to this path, maybe you should change the storePathRootDir config.

@duhenglucky I am sure I've set the '`storePathRootDir`'.

While reviewing the **default value** of '`storePathRootDir`', I suddenly realized that the '`storePathRootDir`' uses the '`store`' directory as a subdirectory.

Here's the configuration I use:

```
storePathRootDir=/rocketmq
```

I mean, If I want to change the directory, I believe the correct configuration should be this:

```
storePathRootDir=/rocketmq/store
```

This is very subtle.
ok， I understand it,I have know the commercial rockemq ， and It use zookeeper switch the role of broker. now why nameserver cannot actor as this role?
now， I design  three nameservers， and brokers can register themselves to it, and it can switch the role of borkers smoothy.

Coverage decreased (-0.01%) to 50.522% when pulling **3f7f573ea74e08234930e663f096bd4c9a62fb82 on liuruiyiyang:fix_issue1375** into **90ae1167981ad586e84dd433c08395aeb92a4111 on apache:develop**.

简单点描述，开启TransientStorePool后，master写入变成 先写堆外内存 ，然后批量commit到 FileChannel写入，而主从同步判断能同步到的消息是已经commit到FileChannel的消息，而消息由堆外内存commit到PageCache是有一定频率的，是受commitIntervalCommitLog，commitCommitLogThoroughInterval两个参数影响，默认值是200ms，所以你能看到消息大体都落在100ms-200ms之间。

> 简单点描述，开启TransientStorePool后，master写入变成 先写堆外内存 ，然后批量commit到 FileChannel写入，而主从同步判断能同步到的消息是已经commit到FileChannel的消息，而消息由堆外内存commit到PageCache是有一定频率的，是受commitIntervalCommitLog，commitCommitLogThoroughInterval两个参数影响，默认值是200ms，所以你能看到消息大体都落在100ms-200ms之间。

懂了，那么将commitIntervalCommitLog，commitCommitLogThoroughInterval调小，频繁的调教到FileChannel是否对系统产生其他影响

it is not enough to modify the bug here . when trigger callback to producer,the msg compress flag is still wrong.
the code is here
TransactionalMessageServiceImpl#
listener.resolveHalfMsg(msgExt);

从恢复日志中看出，在执行org.apache.rocketmq.store.dledger.DLedgerCommitLog#recover方法时，dLedgerFileStore.recover() 发生了异常，导致不能执行后续的 super.recoverNormally(maxPhyOffsetOfConsumeQueue)。

恢复日志中异常日志:
[2019-08-18 21:14:58.515] INFO main - Recover data file to the end of /home/rocketmq/store/node00/commitlog/00000000492847497216

	at org.apache.rocketmq.store.DefaultMessageStore.load(DefaultMessageStore.java:197) [rocketmq-store-4.5.1.jar:4.5.1]

@dongeforever

@liuruiyiyang  try prepare a message larger than 4k ， and do not commit the message。it will never trigger the checkLocalTransaction in producer

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/25229715/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/25229715)

Coverage decreased (-0.02%) to 50.553% when pulling **e7c3dfa1e68de859cf1084879af88530257d354e on xdshent:master** into **2c414fa58acecf9e60a440a238a08431aed5c654 on apache:master**.

The INFO log is OK and could be ignored. It is a code style problem.
When recovering the log file, it comes to the end.
Better to separate the normal end and abnormal end of the recovery
@qqeasonchen 增加单独的定时任务可以解决这个问题；另外，这里面有三个参数可以改一下来避免这个问题，diskMaxUsedSpaceRatio，diskSpaceCleanForciblyRatio这两个参数跟diskSpaceWarningLevelRatio比较接近的时候，会出现上述问题，也可以修改一下这三个参数，保证留有比较多的空间来及时删除文件。
@gaoyf Please check if your subscription information is consistent.

Yes, I should have created the subscription `_MONITOR_CONSUMER` manually when I setted `autoCreateSubscriptionGroup` to false.
But I think it's better to create `MixAll.MONITOR_CONSUMER_GROUP` at the starting of broker, because it's supposed to be a system  subscriptionGroup.
